3DS.name: Ace Combat Assault Horizon Legacy+
3DS.usage: Unlock a character-themed aircraft early, plus a bonus skin and tuning part

3DS.name: Chibi-Robo! Zip Lash
3DS.usage: Unlock figure in the pose of the character (requires Chibi-Robo amiibo)

3DS.name: Kirby: Planet Robobot
3DS.usage: Give Kirby a Copy ability based on the character's abilities and a health item

3DS.name: Luigi's Mansion
3DS.usage: Mushrooms you find will be health-restoring Super Mushrooms instead of Poison Mushrooms

3DS.name: Mario & Luigi: Bowser's Inside Story + Bowser Jr.'s Journey
3DS.usage: Receive a helpful item

3DS.name: Mario & Luigi: Paper Jam
3DS.usage: Unlock character cards to help you in battle

3DS.name: Mario & Luigi: Superstar Saga + Bowser's Minions
3DS.usage: Receive a stamp and equipment for the main quest

3DS.name: Mario & Sonic at the Rio 2016 Olympic Games
3DS.usage: Boost power of the Mario Mii suit for the day

3DS.name: Mario Party: Star Rush
3DS.usage: Play as or receive bonus from this character, depending on the mode

3DS.name: Mario Party: The Top 100
3DS.usage: Minigame Island: If you land on an amiibo space, use to receive coins / Use to revive your character once

3DS.name: Metroid Prime: Blast Ball
3DS.usage: Unlock an armor paint job based on the character

3DS.name: Metroid Prime: Federation Force
3DS.usage: Unlock an armor paint job based on the character for use in Blast Ball

3DS.name: Miitopia
3DS.usage: Unlock a character-based costume

3DS.name: Mini Mario & Friends amiibo Challenge
3DS.usage: Play stages as a Mini version of this character, with a unique special ability, and unlock character-specific stages

3DS.name: One Piece: Super Grand Battle! X
3DS.usage: Unlock a character-based costume with special abilities

3DS.name: Picross 3D Round 2
3DS.usage: Unlock a character-based puzzle

3DS.name: Style Savvy: Fashion Forward
3DS.usage: Unlock a character-themed accessory

3DS.name: Style Savvy: Styling Star
3DS.usage: Unlock a character-themed pattern

3DS.name: Super Smash Bros. for Nintendo 3DS
3DS.usage: Battle and train up a computer-controlled Figure Player of the character

3DS.name: WarioWare Gold
3DS.usage: Receive a sketch of the character from Wario which can be exchanged for in-game coins

3DS.name: Yoshi's Woolly World
3DS.usage: Unlock a character-based Yoshi yarn pattern

WiiU.name: Mario & Sonic at the Rio 2016 Olympic Games
WiiU.usage: Play the Mario League, for a chance to unlock the Mario Mii costume

WiiU.name: Mario Kart 8
WiiU.usage: Unlock a character-themed Mii racing suit

WiiU.name: Mario Party 10
WiiU.usage: Use as game piece in amiibo Party / Customize game board in amiibo Party

WiiU.name: Mario Tennis: Ultra Smash
WiiU.usage: Play alongside and train up a computer-controlled character

WiiU.name: Mini Mario & Friends amiibo Challenge
WiiU.usage: Play stages as a Mini version of this character, with a unique special ability, and unlock character-specific stages

WiiU.name: Super Mario Maker
WiiU.usage: Unlock a character-based Mystery Mushroom costume

WiiU.name: Super Smash Bros. for Wii U
WiiU.usage: Battle and train up a computer-controlled Figure Player of the character

WiiU.name: Yoshi's Woolly World
WiiU.usage: Unlock a character-based Yoshi yarn pattern

Switch.name: Mario + Rabbids: Kingdom Battle
Switch.usage: Unlock an amiibo-exclusive weapon for the character and their Rabbid counterpart

Switch.name: Mario Kart 8 Deluxe
Switch.usage: Unlock a character-themed Mii racing suit

Switch.name: Super Mario 3D World + Bowser's Fury
Switch.usage: Receive a particular power-up depending on the character

Switch.name: Super Mario Odyssey
Switch.usage: Receive a character-based costume / Gain temporary invincibility

Switch.name: Super Smash Bros. Ultimate
Switch.usage: Battle and train up a computer-controlled Figure Player of the character
